name: Skyline Aviation Training Academy
about: Skyline Aviation Training Academy, established in April 2006, is a premier flight school and aeronautical engineering training academy in Sri Lanka. Approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka and the Board of Investment, it stands as the only fully-approved flying training academy in the country. Our programs are taught by experienced professionals with a wealth of practical experience, ensuring students receive top-tier training in the science, practice, and business of aviation. We offer comprehensive flight training, including solo flights, cross-country navigation, emergency procedures, and night-flight ratings, along with ground school lectures to prepare students for CAASL written exams. Our commitment to quality and structured approach has earned us an unparalleled reputation for producing top-quality pilots. At Skyline Aviation, we are dedicated to infusing the passion for aviation into new recruits and helping them achieve their dreams of flying.
